scripts.compress: npm run compress-images && npm run compress-audio
scripts.entries-report: firebase database:get /entries | jq '[.[] | .[] | {name: .name, email: .email, earned_at: .earned_at}]' | ./node_modules/json2csv/bin/json2csv.js -o reports/entries-`date "+%Y%m%d"`.csv && echo generated in reports/entries-`date "+%Y%m%d"`.csv
scripts.optins-report: firebase database:get /opt_ins | jq '[.[] | {name: .name, email: .email, opt_in: .opt_in}]' | ./node_modules/json2csv/bin/json2csv.js -o reports/opt_ins-`date "+%Y%m%d"`.csv && echo generated in reports/opt_ins-`date "+%Y%m%d"`.csv
